data.name: Prime Arena - Founder Pack
data.detailed_description:
Unlock All Current and Future Prime Arena Heroes!
Buying this pack you will get the infinite access to all existing and upcoming heroes immediately and the remarkable rewards in the nearest future.

What you will get immediately:


Don't wait for your favorite hero in the rotation!
Play all heroes with no restrictions. You’ll get all current Heroes and future too.

What you will get in the nearest future:


Like chatting with other players? Stand out among them!
Use exclusive emoticons to express your emotions.

Make your mark in Prime Arena! Support the project now, and all other players will see your name in the game credits. That's our way of saying many thanks to you.

It's always pleasant to stand out among other players! Emphasize your special status with an in-game portrait. You will be hard to miss.

Sow fear among opponents on the map! Lift up in place of the defeated enemies a special banner. Let everyone see your power!

data.short_description: Unlock All Current and Future Prime Arena Heroes! Buying this pack you will get the infinite access to all existing and upcoming heroes immediately and the remarlable rewardds in the nearest future.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64/32-bit Windows 7, 64/32-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64/32-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 or above / or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64/32-bit Windows 7, 64/32-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64/32-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K or above / or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 770 / AMD GPU Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
